Articles.Content:
Lots of people would start protesting for the return of Christmas cookies.

What if the Moon and Jupiter switched places?

Humans would die from Jupiter's electromagnetic waves system. Also, possibly, the atmosphere would leave and the earth would tear apart.

What if redundancy stopped existing?

Everyone dies.

What if Twilight was the most famous movie in the world?

We would die because the fanbase would ally with every bad country in the world and destroy us.

What if Pewdiepie's YT channel never existed?

Gaming can no longer be monetized. All gamers become miserable at the licenses on the games stating that it is not legal.

What if the space program was taken over by little green men?

Kerbals.

What if I was the only Time Lord left in the universe?

I know you're the Doctor, but Who are you again?

What if- 9999999999 Aperture Science is experiencing technical difficulties. Please stand by.

"Hello, is anyone in ther- AAAAH! You look teri- good. Looking good actually."

What if this sentence never existed?

Then this reply wouldn't exist either.

What if a Kerbal took the ring of power?

The what?

What if the only thing to watch was anime?

I wouldn't watch TV.

What if Portal was real?

Then there would be an immortal test subject wandering the earth.

What if a Kerbal had the ring of power?

They would be here.

What if- Connection lost: This satellite has crashed into Mt. Everest.

Who care K^2 is now higher.

What if: Laos never met Air Aim'er'i'c'a

Then you wouldn't of said that.

What if i was Gordon Freeman?

You'd most likely die.

What If Science.

Initiating auto-complete:

What If Science. was boring?

Then we're never gonna send men to Mars.

---

What if the military was ran by women?

There would be a a sudden shortage of wars.

What if Doctor Who suddenly was cancelled?

Every whovian DIES.

What if KSP was sold to Disney, and had a terrible TV show made out of it?

I wouldn't give a ding-dong, since I have all of it on my hard-drive. B-] (ninja'd...)

Don't care, as long as they keep developing the game! >:-I

What if the Sun's orbit around the Earth decays??? :-O

The Earth will blow up.

Ponies.

Are Annoying.

What if everyone listened to Let It Go from Frozen all day every day?

I would die.

What if mud never existed?

Life would be way more boring.

What if MLP never existed? (I would be happy if it didn't)

I'd like trains.

What if Sun never liked mud?
